<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command
</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.56

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Multiplayer

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> 
* In MP: Returns the unit's table of scores (infantry kills, soft vehicle kills, armor kills, air kills, deaths, total score).
* In SP: Empty array []
</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value>  '''getPlayerScores''' unitName
</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unitName: [[Object]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - the score of the given player in format [infantry kills, soft vehicle kills, armor kills, air kills, deaths, total score]
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[getPlayerScores]] BIS_player1;</code>

 </value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[score]], [[addScore]], [[scoreSide]], [[addScoreSide]], [[addPlayerScores]]
</value></part></template>
